questionTitle: form of transport is as popular as the private car.
What do you hope to do when you graduate? ...............................
anwers: I haven't decided to go anywhere yet.
Yes, I'm willing to have a job .
I hope I can find a job in a pharmacy.
I hope they want to have more spare time.

questionTitle: The girl's ................ was incomprehensible to the head teacher.

Stop that nonsense, ................?
The computer has multiplied these two nine-digit numbers with a(n) .......................... speed .
What a stupid fellow, ................?
